author: Perplexity AI + Claude Code
description: Custom Claude CLI skills for frontend development, TypeScript, SEO, Tailwind CSS, and Cloudflare infrastructure

skills.name: frontend-code-review
skills.description: Frontend code review: HTML/CSS/JS, React/Vue/Svelte, A11Y, performance, security.
example_prompts: Review this React component for accessibility and performance
Check this HTML/CSS for best practices
Analyze this Vue.js app for security issues
Audit this SPA for Core Web Vitals optimization

skills.name: typescript-checker
skills.description: TypeScript type checking, unsafe any detection, tsconfig recommendations.
example_prompts: Find and fix all any types in this file
Check this TypeScript project for type safety issues
Review tsconfig.json for strict mode compliance
Analyze these types for better type inference
Suggest improvements for this complex generic type

skills.name: seo-analyzer
skills.description: SEO analysis of HTML pages: meta tags, headings, schema, technical SEO.
example_prompts: Analyze this HTML page for SEO issues and improvements
Review meta tags for this landing page
Check structured data implementation for e-commerce product
Audit multilingual site for hreflang correctness
Evaluate Core Web Vitals impact on SEO

skills.name: tailwind-validator
skills.description: Tailwind CSS usage validation: utility classes, responsive, dark mode.
example_prompts: Review this component for Tailwind CSS best practices
Optimize these Tailwind classNames for mobile-first design
Validate tailwind.config.js setup and suggest improvements
Check dark mode implementation across this codebase
Audit responsive breakpoints usage

skills.name: cloudflare-inspector
skills.description: Cloudflare config review: DNS, caching, SSL/TLS, WAF, Workers.
example_prompts: Review my Cloudflare DNS and SSL configuration for security issues
Analyze this Cloudflare Worker script for performance and error handling
Audit WAF and security settings for e-commerce site
Check caching strategy for optimal performance
Validate Page Rules and Redirect Rules setup

global.description: Install skills to ~/.claude/skills/ (available in all projects)
